# accelbyte_match_ruleset (Resource)

AccelByte Match Ruleset resource



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `configuration` (String)
- `name` (String) Name of match ruleset

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Match ruleset identifier
